name: Coeur d'Alene Aviation and Maintenance
about: Coeur d'Alene Aviation and Maintenance is a premier flight school and maintenance facility located at the Coeur d'Alene Airport. Under the new ownership of Kirk Lauer and Kristian Nylund, the school continues to build on its award-winning legacy. Kirk, with over 20 years in the auto industry, oversees the expansion of the maintenance department and the development of a new hangar, while Kristian, a Boeing 757/767 First Officer with extensive flight instruction experience, leads the flight instruction program. The school offers personalized, professional training for various certifications, including Private, Instrument, Commercial, and Flight Instructor, using a fleet that includes Cessna 150, Cessna 172, Cessna 310, and brand new Tecnam P2008 aircraft, along with a DCX MAX AATD simulator. With a dedicated team of instructors and on-site mechanics, Coeur d'Alene Aviation and Maintenance is committed to your aviation success.
